greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Regular triangle read by rows where T(n, k) is the number of set partitions of {1, ..., n} requiring k steps of removing singletons and cyclical adjacency initiators until reaching a fixed point, n >= 0, 0 <= k <= n.
comment: See Callan's article for details on this transformation (SeparateIS).
link: David Callan, On conjugates for set partitions and integer compositions, arXiv:math/0508052 [math.CO], 2005.
xref: Row sums are A000110. First column is A324011.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Feb 14 2019
